statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_node_metadata;
SELECT node_name, node_ip_address FROM blockchain_node_metadata;
SELECT node_name, block_height FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE node_status = 'active';
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_ip_address FROM blockchain_node_metadata ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE block_height > 1000 ORDER BY block_height ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT node_name, node_ip_address FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE block_height > 1000 ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT node_id, node_status FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE block_height BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT node_status FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE node_ip_address LIKE '%.com';
SELECT node_name, block_height FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE node_status = 'active' AND node_ip_address NOT LIKE '%localhost%' ORDER BY block_height DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_node_metadata;
SELECT node_name, node_url FROM blockchain_node_metadata ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_ip, block_height FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE block_height > 1000;
SELECT node_name, node_url, block_height FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE node_id = 3;
SELECT node_id, COUNT(*) FROM monitoring_logs GROUP BY node_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT node_name, node_url FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT node_name, block_height FROM blockchain_node_metadata WHERE block_height > 10000;
SELECT node_name, node_url, log_timestamp FROM blockchain_node_metadata JOIN monitoring_logs ON blockchain_node_metadata.node_id = monitoring_logs.node_id;

SELECT node_name, node_url, log_timestamp FROM blockchain_node_metadata JOIN monitoring_logs ON blockchain_node_metadata.node_id = monitoring_logs.node_id WHERE monitoring_logs.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT node_name, node_url, log_timestamp, log_message FROM blockchain_node_metadata JOIN monitoring_logs ON blockchain_node_metadata.node_id = monitoring_logs.node_id WHERE monitoring_logs.log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT node_name, node_address FROM blockchain_nodes ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT node_name FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_address FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM block_metadata ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name, connection_timestamp FROM blockchain_nodes JOIN node_connections ON blockchain_nodes.node_id = node_connections.node_id WHERE node_connections.connected_node_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT block_id, block_hash FROM block_metadata WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT node_id, COUNT(connection_id) AS connection_count FROM node_connections GROUP BY node_id HAVING COUNT(connection_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT id, node_name, ip_address, port FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT node_name, ip_address, port FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE port > 8080;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT node_name, ip_address, last_checked_at FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE port > 8000;
SELECT node_name, ip_address, port FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE 'node%' ORDER BY last_checked_at DESC;

SELECT b.block_id, b.miner_address, t.sender_address, t.recipient_address, t.amount FROM blocks b JOIN block_transactions bt ON b.block_id = bt.block_id JOIN transactions t ON bt.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;

SELECT b.block_id, b.timestamp, COUNT(bt.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM blocks b LEFT JOIN block_transactions bt ON b.block_id = bt.block_id GROUP BY b.block_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC, b.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_url FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_status = TRUE;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM block_headers ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT tx_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT node_id, memory_usage, cpu_usage FROM node_stats WHERE node_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_url FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_status = TRUE;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM block_headers ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT tx_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT node_id, log_timestamp FROM node_logs WHERE node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
